ygData.subject: Re: Happy --etc
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I figured out what happened b/c I placed a call to Verant. I didn t think I would get through but I was busy doing stuff near the phone anyway and so
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I figured out what happened b/c I
placed a call to Verant. I didn't think I would get
through but I was busy doing stuff near the phone anyway
and so figured I'd try.<br><br>During my install,
everything went in except the Vpatch. This must happen quite
a bit b/c they just e-mailed me the vpatch program.
I ran it, and afterwards, it put the button on my
EQ main executable file. They seemed to know exactly
what was going on.<br><br>And since then, I also have
not lagged or dl'd from Drinal (although that's only
2 hours I've been able to play since then).
Hopefully the patches fixed disconnect and lag issues for
me as well.<br><br>So if anyone is missing that
button-- one thing they did say was not to reinstall-- get
the vpatch program and save it to the EQ directory.
Run the vpatch and everything will be
alright.<br><br>shooman/FatedHue
